lead_paragraph: SPAFFORD--John K.,III, died on July 1, 2016. John "Spoof" was 65 years old and a lifelong resident of Cold Spring Harbor, NY. He is survived by his mother Joan W. Spafford, beloved son Alex, former wife Pat, sisters, Jamie Spafford, Kate Sparling and Mair Glosson, several nieces, nephews and cousins. John was predeceased by his father John K. Spafford Jr. and his brother Charles Forrest "Forrie" Spafford. A memorial service and celebration of John's life will be held on August 13, 2016 at 4:00pm at St. John's Episcopal Church, Cold Spring Harbor. Memorial contributions may be made to SavetheChildren.org 1/3
